claims.description: The PSO-optimized gains ensure global asymptotic stability of the DIP system.

claims.description: The PSO-optimized gains maintain Lyapunov stability for the closed-loop DIP system.

claims.description: Under the stability condition and with decreasing inertia weight, PSO converges to the global optimum with probability 1 for unimodal functions.
